txt.en: Listen to Fróthi and Léothred's tale
'If only we had known then what we know now. To think of the added prosperity that both our peoples unknowingly abandoned.'
'If only we had known then what we know now.'
'Fram set out towards Scatha's hoard, as he often did.'
'Fram set out towards Scatha's hoard, as he often did. On this journey he had no intention of taking riches, however. His only goal was to confront Karazgar....'
'The bodies of the Dwarves were nothing more than another misdirection by the devious Karazgar.'
'The bodies of the dwarves were nothing more than another misdirection by the devious Karazgar. He wanted nothing more than to stoke the fires of mistrust in the north.'
Listen to Fróthi and Léothred's tale.
Léothred and Fróthi have finally uncovered the truth of how Fram died and who killed him.
